DOC.brief_summary: The aim study delineate epidemiological profile HIV seropositive patient antiretroviral therapy Clinical Hospital Federal University Goiás .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To delineate epidemiological profile HIV seropositive patient antiretroviral therapy Clinical Hospital Federal University Goiás . Methods : The present study documental analitical descriptive conduct Clinical Hospital Federal University Goiás , trough data collection 222 record individual drug therapy . Data collect regard personal aspect , aspect related infection information use therapeutic .
DOC.criteria: All patient data hospital All diagnose HIV Using antiretroviral drug Incompleted record Patients n't take medicine regularly .
